Text: Pay for this! We should all appreciate Radiohead's good example to skip the record companies and let the fans pay what they think it's worth.
I paid for it. But I figured I would contribute to TPB a bit as well.
You should buy this music!! Your price is their price on theit website!! you can buy it 1£ if you want!! For once artists have such great ideas, we should encourage them!
I agree to what´s been said above! Pay for this at Radiohead´s website. I payed 10 quid. It´s a kick in the balls on the incompetent assholes of the record companies.
the site is to bogged down right now.. downloading today paying for it later this week once the site speeds up again.
160 kbps means crap quality. Why pay for this kind of material? Nice to know how much Radiohead cares about their fans...
If its good Ill buy it :)

Well, I've tried to pay. Twice. But some genius new invention to improve security concerning credit card payments doesn't seem to work in either Firefox, Safari nor Opera. (It's not Radiohead's fault I believe. It's bank specific from what I gather)
